Content:: Eirodziesma (English: Eurosong) was a Latvian annual televised song competition produced by Latvijas Televīzija. It was used to select Latvia's entry in the Eurovision Song Contest since Latvia's début in 2000, but was cancelled in favour of Dziesma in 2013.  This Latvia-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
